fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Defend: Target another Beast. One random attack or negative effect against them will be redirected to you. **Locked**: This can redirect up to two effects and will not inform the original ability user that they were redirected.
-Endure (2-shot): If you would die tonight, you simply do not. In addition, you will learn the identity of anyone who deals a negative effect to you, including attacks.
-Dino Roar (**Locked**, 1-shot): All Protective (or similar) roles are Astrally roleblocked tonight, piercing roleblock immunity.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-You are immune to most negative effects (besides attacks/lynches)- If the host deems it to be “harmful”, it does not effect you, you will know what happened, but the original ability user will not be informed that they failed. Investigations do not count as “harmful”, roleblocks and redirects do.
-You have passive Basic Defense.
-**Unlock Condition**: If you are targeted by a Protective or Support role that would deal a harmful effect to you (including attacking), Unlock.
